sourcesContent:
<template>
	<van-cell
		center
		:title="checked ? $t('settings.theme.dark') : $t('settings.theme.light')"
	>
		<template #right-icon>
			<van-switch v-model="checked" @change="changeTheme" />
		</template>
	</van-cell>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue';
import { onMounted } from 'vue';
import { computed } from 'vue';
import { useStore } from 'vuex';

const store = useStore();

const theme = computed(() => store.state.Auth.nativeData.theme_mode);

const checked = ref(false);

onMounted(() => {
	if (theme.value === 'dark') {
		checked.value = true;
	}
});

function changeTheme() {
	checked.value
		? store.dispatch('Auth/changeTheme', 'dark')
		: store.dispatch('Auth/changeTheme', 'light');
}
</script>

<style scoped></style>
